pages.title: Bismuth
pages.text: A metal that shimmers in all the colors of the rainbow.$(br)The small seedlings you collected are far too small to be used for any meaningful purpose.$(br)How do they grow without a budding block? One thing you noticed: it slightly grew in proximity of other metals while you had both in your pocket.

pages.title: Growing Bismuth
pages.text: Instead of sacrificing whole metal blocks, the $(l:magical_blocks/crystallarieum)Crystallarieum$() provides a controlled substrate as well as a finer and more efficient way to provide nutrients.
